title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 261.4 - Attorney compensation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 261.4 - Attorney compensation

State Regulations

No insurer shall compensate an attorney on a capitated fee basis in connection with a prepaid legal services plan. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
261.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
